name: PHVS_CertifierTypes_NCHS
title: Certifier Types (NCHS)
description: To reflect the type of certifier for the death certificate.

concept.display: Medical Examiner/Coroner-On the basis of examination, and/or investigation, in my opinion, death occurred at the time, date, and place, and due to the cause(s) and manner stated.
Pronouncing & Certifying physician-To the best of my knowledge, death occurred at the time, date, and place, and due to the cause(s) and manner stated.
Certifying physician-To the best of my knowledge, death occurred due to the cause(s) and manner stated.
